articles.title: U.S. deep freeze forecast to break Christmas Eve records - Reuters
articles.description: An arctic blast that has gripped much of the United States this week, disrupting daily life and holiday travel for millions of Americans, was expected to produce the coldest Christmas Eve on record in several cities from Pennsylvania to Florida.

articles.title: 19-year-old killed in Mall of America shooting in Minnesota - CBC News
articles.description: A teenager was killed during a shooting at the Mall of America on Friday that sent frightened customers at the country's largest shopping centre racing into a lockdown just before the holiday weekend, police said.

articles.title: Flights cancelled, traffic chaos leaves at least six dead in Canada and United States - ABC News
articles.description: Heavy snow and wind conditions pummel US and Canada cause mayhem on the roads ahead of the year-end holidays, with some parts of North America dropping to -38 degrees Celsius.
articles.content:
More than 240 million people have been put under an extreme weather alert as a deep freeze thwarted travel plans, knocked out power and caused at least six deaths across North America.
